excerpt: "Labcorp is now marketing its blood-based amyloid-tau-neurodegeneration test (ATN Profile) to U.S. doctors to help determine which patients under evaluation for possible Alzheimer's disease need advanced testing. However, medical experts say it will be several years before blood tests for Alzheimer's become an everyday tool in the clinic. ( Reuters)"
